alert.note: Alert for Carter; Garvin; Jefferson; Johnston; Love; Marshall; Murray; Pontotoc; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 9:58AM CDT until June 08 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Johnston County in southeastern Oklahoma... Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... Central Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Love County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Carter County in southern Oklahoma... Southwestern Pontotoc County in east central Oklahoma... Northwestern Marshall County in southeastern Oklahoma... Murray County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 958 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Roff to near Sugden, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Ada, Pauls Valley, Sulphur, Madill, Tishomingo, Davis, Marietta, Waurika, Lone Grove, Healdton, Wynnewood, Wilson, Comanche, Stratford, Dickson, Ringling, Mannsville, Ryan and Roff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Carter; Garvin; Jefferson; Johnston; Love; Marshall; Murray; Pontotoc; Stephens
